summary: Defines the core infrastructure abstraction used by Prefect to construct deployment metadata, manage the lifecycle of flow runs (preparation, preview, publishing to a work pool, and execution), and handle logging and runner detection, along with a simple result wrapper indicating success or failure.
business_intent: Provides a reusable foundation for configuring and executing Prefect workflows in various environments, allowing developers to programmatically set up deployments, interact with work pools, and obtain consistent success/failure feedback.
